metadataAttributes.Title: Ready, Set, Future! Introduction to Futures Thinking
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Do you want to think about the future with more creativity and optimism? Do you want to see what’s coming faster, so you can be better prepared for disruptions and more in control of your future? Do you want to get better at changing what’s possible today – in your company, your industry, your community, and in your own life?
